Earthquake App

16 Jul 2019

Earthquake was my first free-handed take at an iOS App, built to run on the iPhone 8. It reaches out to the U.S. Geological Surveyâ€™s database on earthquakes and displays the data in an ordered list. Additionally, every earthquake can be selected to display more information, including a map of where the Earthquake hit and a distance from the user of the app. I also implemented a scroll-to-refresh functionality, as well as an external link back to the USGS website.
